about:
Hi. I'm **Pratik Garai**. I'm an undergraduate pursuing Computer Science and Engineering at VIT Chennai with a specializatio in AI/ML. I like exploring various domains of Computer Science and keep exploring and learning frameworks and technologies! I have experience working with **Full-Stack Web Developement and Machine Learning**. 

Currently, I am learning about Decentralised App development on Etherium and also deepening my knowledge of AI and exploring various tools in that domain.

 I like to keep building mini-projects as I learn a new technology, majority of which are available on my **Github**.
